original_text: In the first chariot were red horses; and in the second chariot black horses;
korean_text: 첫째 병거는 붉은 말들이, 둘째 병거는 검은 말들이,

sentences.original_text: In first chariot were red horses
sentences.korean_translation: 첫 번째 병거에는 붉은 말들이 있었고

sentences.original_text: and in second chariot black horses
sentences.korean_translation: 두 번째 병거에는 검은 말들이 있었다
